description:
This modules prepares the hosts for Ambari and installs Agent/Server service. This means that firewall services 
are stopped, ntp is installed and started, machines, the agent/clients are installed&started and finally the Ambari 
clients are given information on where to find the server machine.
summary: This module installs Ambari (the hadoop management and monitoring system) agent and/or server. It is tested with CentOS (6.4).
name: vzach-ambari
author: Valentin Zacharias and Malte Nottmeyer
